scripts.publish-linux: dotnet publish src/diff-buddy/diff-buddy.csproj -c Release -r linux-x64 --no-self-contained -o bin
scripts.publish-win32: dotnet publish src/diff-buddy/diff-buddy.csproj -c Release -r win-x64 --no-self-contained -o bin
scripts.publish-osx: dotnet publish src/diff-buddy/diff-buddy.csproj -c Release -r osx-x64 --no-self-contained -o bin
